ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisReppointment of PIERRE R. DION of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the National Parole Board to hold office during good behaviour for a period of five years; and designation of PIERRE R. DION as Vice-Chairperson of the Appeal Division of the National Parole Board; effective July 28, 2008.
